food.question: I am long and yellow, monkeys love to peel me! What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 A popular snack for primates
💛 My color is often associated with happiness
📏 You can measure things with me, if I am long enough

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me with cookies! What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I am often served cold
🐮 Baby cows drink me from their mothers
🦴 I am good for your bones

food.question: I am round and red, and grow on trees. An apple a day keeps the doctor away! What am I?

hints.text: 🍏 I am a popular fruit
🥧 You can make pie with me
🍎 Snow White ate me

food.question: I am orange and crunchy, and rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Bugs Bunny loves me
🌱 I grow in the ground
👁️ I am good for your eyes

food.question: I am sweet and cold, and come in many flavors. Kids love me on a hot day! What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I am often served in a cone
☀️ I am a treat when it's warm outside
🍨 Chocolate, vanilla, and strawberry are my friends

food.question: I am a yellow fruit with a bumpy skin, and I taste sour. What am I?

hints.text: 🍋 You can make lemonade with me
💛 My color is in my name
🥴 I make your face pucker

food.question: I'm a small, round veggie, often green. Sometimes I hide, so I'm hard to be seen. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I grow in a pod
🥣 I am a simple side dish
🌱 I can be a plant or just the small round seed

food.question: I am made of flour, water and yeast, then baked in a warm oven. I am often sliced. What am I?

hints.text: 🥪 You can make a sandwich with me
🔥 I need heat to become delicious
🌾 My main ingredient comes from a plant.

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy skin, and my flesh is green. I'm named after a bird, but I cannot sing! What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 I am small and brown on the outside
✈️ I am named after an animal that cannot fly
🟢 I have black seeds and green inside

food.question: I am a long green vegetable with seeds inside. You can eat the pod. I am delicious in salads and stir-fries. What am I?

hints.text: 🥗 I'm often mixed in salads
🌱 I'm a legume, meaning my seeds grow in pods
🥢 Stir-fries with chicken and rice are better with me.

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I carry my home on my back.
🐌 I'm not a bug, but I leave a slimy trail.
🐢 I'm related to turtles, but much smaller.

ocean.question: I am big and blue, and fish swim inside me. What am I?

hints.text: 💦 I am made of water, but you can't drink all of me.
🚢 Boats sail on me.
🐋 Whales live in me.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. Who am I?

hints.text: 💪 I have many arms.
⚫ I can squirt ink.
🐙 I am a type of sea creature.

ocean.question: I am a fish with a very flat body and both of my eyes on one side. What am I?

hints.text: 〰️ I like to hide in the sand.
🎣 Some people eat me for dinner.
🐟 I'm a strange looking type of fish.

ocean.question: I am a very large mammal that lives in the ocean and sings songs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am bigger than a car.
🎶 I use sounds to talk to others of my kind.
💦 I breathe air, even though I live in the water.

ocean.question: I’m a colorful fish that lives in a sea anemone. What am I?

hints.text: 🧡 I'm often orange and white.
🏠 The sea anemone is my home.
🐠 You might have seen me in a movie about finding someone.

ocean.question: I am a type of coral that looks like a brain. What am I?

hints.text: 🧠 I have many grooves and ridges.
🪨 I'm not alive like you, but I am a living thing.
🌊 I can be found in coral reefs.

ocean.question: I am a place in the ocean that is very deep and dark, deeper than any land is tall. What am I?

hints.text: 🔦 Very little sunlight reaches me.
🤯 The pressure here is extremely high.
🌊 I am the deepest part of the ocean.

ocean.question: I'm a long, thin fish with no scales, that looks like a snake. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I can sometimes hide in rocks and crevices.
🎣 Some types of me can give you a shock.
🐟 I am a strange type of fish that doesn't look like most others.

ocean.question: I am a current in the ocean that moves warm water from the Gulf of Mexico to Europe. What am I?

hints.text: 🌡️ I help keep Europe warmer than it would be otherwise.
🌊 I am like a river flowing through the ocean.
🌎 My name refers to a specific body of water.
